page.title: List of terms for administrative divisions

revisions.rev:
This is a list of [[english language|English]] and non-English terms for [[administrative division]]s. ==English== {{columns |width=150px |col1 = *[[Bailiwick]] *[[Borough]] *[[canton (administrative division)|Canton]] *[[City]] *[[Commune (intentional community)|Commune]] *[[County]] *[[Department (administrative division)|Department]] *[[District]] *[[Duchy]] |col2 = *[[Emirate]] *[[Federal state]] *[[Municipality]] *[[Parish (administrative division)|Parish]] *[[Prefecture]] *[[Province]] *[[Region#Administrative regions|Region]] *[[Rural district]] *[[Shire]] |col3 = *[[Federated state|State (federative)]] *[[Constituent state|State (constituent)]] *[[Subdistrict]] *[[Subprefecture]] *[[Town]] *[[Township]] *[[Village]] *[[Viceroyalty]] *[[Voivodeship]] }} ==Non-English== This is an alphabetical list of native non-English terms for administrative divisions; some, such as ''arrondissement'' and ''okrug'', have become English [[loanword]]s. Terms in italics are prefixes or suffixes. {{Expand list|date=August 2008}} {| class="wikitable" !width="150px"| Name !!width="260px"| Countries !!width="120px"| English
